description: With 4 simple ingredients you create a creamy, sweet and zesty dessert.
keywords: Fruit pudding,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango,Peanut free
name: Mango Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium mango, peeled, de-seeded and mashed

recipeInstructions.text: Blend all ingredients together apart from the lime zest in a blender until smooth.
Empty contents into 4 serving dishes, garnish with lime zest and allow to set for 30 minutes in the fridge before serving.
